title: In-N-Out Calories: Burger Breakdown
meta_description: Explore in n out calories for a classic hamburgerâ€”390 kcal total, with full macros, protein, fat, and tips to customize without overdoing it.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: fresh beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, signature spread; no cheese or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, patty size, custom orders, and preparation; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A standard In-N-Out hamburger packs 390 calories and 16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with In-N-Out's published info.

faqs.q: How many in n out calories in a hamburger?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out hamburger has 390 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for in n out calories in a burger?
faqs.a: 39 g carbs, 19 g fat, 16 g protein, and 670 mg sodium.

faqs.q: In n out calories for fries?
faqs.a: Regular fries are about 395 calories; check for variations.

faqs.q: How to lower in n out calories on a burger?
faqs.a: Opt for protein style (no bun) to cut ~150 calories, or skip the spread.

faqs.q: In n out calories in a double-double?
faqs.a: A Double-Double is around 670 calories with two patties and cheese.
